sentences.en: However, Bari Coach Antonio Conte - a former Juve midfielder hero - is the favourite to take the hot seat.
sentences.cn: 然而前尤文中场英雄, 巴里主教练安东尼奥.孔蒂是这一位置的最热门人选.

sentences.en: In the numerous legend that concerns him, have such conte of a afford for thought.
sentences.cn: 在有关他的众多传奇中, 有这样一则耐人寻味的小故事.

sentences.en: President Conte, a diabetic and chain smoker, had been ill for several years.
sentences.cn: Conte总统, 糖尿病患者并有严重的烟瘾, 已患病多年.
